Detailed Description

LevDEA gives access to deterministic levenshtein automata.

It is an implementation of the concepts described in "S. Mihov and K. Schulz. Fast approximate search in large dictionaries. Computational Linguistics, 30, 2004."

This class is one huge memory leak!!!

Author:
Ulrich Reffle
Date:
2006

Follow a transition in the automaton.
